page.title: 17THE ALDBOROUGH COMMUNITY BUS
page.content: The Community bus service was started six years ago by Mr Hibberton.This was an idea put forward at a meeting in the community centre because of lack of public transport.The bus runs to Sheringham,Holt,North Walsham and Aylsham during the week and at weekends does excursions eg.to Norwich for shoping and Theatre Royal,stately homes and gardens,shows on Cromer pier and recently Cromer cinema .Elderly people get half price.On average 12 people use the bus each journey.There are 15 drivers all are voluntary.The bus was a 12 seater but a new diesel 16 seater is now in use.There are several picking up places.The organizer of the bus is now Mr Carter who is always adding new routes. Richard Poynton did the research on the community bus.
